nodes.text: An Imperial garrison historian was a Human Imperial Corporal who maintained important records.

During the Empire Day festivities of 1 ABY, he resided in the city of Narmlé on Rori. It was here that he met an unknown Imperial, sent to help him by an Imperial PR officer. The historian had an important mission for this Imperial, which involved acquiring a historical disk which he needed for a report he was writing. The Imperial had the choice to either slay a number of Rebel foes for the disk, or meet up with a noble in the Bestine tavern. It is unknown which option the Imperial took, but he did successfully acquire the disk.

It was then that the Imperial had to continue his mission, by meeting up with a commoner in Bela Vistal. The commoner instructed the Imperial to meet up with another individual in Dee'ja Peak. Upon doing so, Imperial promptly returned to the historian, to inform him that he had completed his mission. Yet the mission was not truly complete, for the historian had the Imperial visit an Imperial data officer on Dathomir.

An Imperial garrison historian, who lacks an official name, was a Non-Player Character (NPC) in the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies. During the Empire Day live event from June 29, 2005 to July 11, 2005 he could be found in Narmle. He was part of a quest titled, "Happy Empire Day," which sent players on an important mission throughout the galaxy.
